name: Oz, Weilder of Resolve
text: You can Special Summon this card from your hand in Attack Position, and if you do, it cannot be used as material for the Synchro, Xyz or Link Summon of any monster. If this card destroys a monster by battle: shuffle 1 card your opponent controls into the Deck, then this card can attack again. You can only activate this effect of “Oz, Wielder of the Resolve” once per turn.
